definition: remuneration for literary or artistic work
pen/pencil/writing brush/to write or compose/the strokes of Chinese characters/classifier for sums of money, deals/CL:支[zhi1],枝[zhi1]

sentences.english: He instead became a professional painter who received commissions from his scholar friends.
sentences.chinese: 他轉而成爲職業畫家，從士人友人處取得潤筆。
